actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to provide for grants to interstate metropolitan organizations.

summary.text: Provides for grants to interstate metropolitan organizations under the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968. Specifies purposes for which such grants may be utilized. Authorizes appropriations to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to provide for grants to interstate metropolitan organizations.
